reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of FNSP 200, FNIS 210, FNSP 210, FNIS 220, FNSP 220. (or third-year standing.)
Course Title: New Media Practices and Applications. This course is intended for undergraduate students only. If you're a graduate student, please visit: http://fnis.arts.ubc.ca/graduate-courses/ regarding the registration process.
description: Topics will vary from year to year. Consult the departmental website: http://fnsp.arts.ubc.ca.
